title: Red Receives a Coded Mission
plot_change_note: Dialogue adds clarification about the drive's contents, the method of meeting Grandmother (password and attire), and expands on stealth instructions. These details deepen and specify the original plot without contradicting motivations or behavior. The plot has been updated to include these nuances for consistency.

title: Wolf Infiltrates the Colony
plot_change_note: The dialogue introduces the detail that Red and Axel split up to handle time-sensitive tasks after being detected, diverging from the original plot where they escape together through the hatch. The updated plot reflects this tactical split, maintaining character motivations and the urgency introduced by the drone detection.

title: Sabotage on the Shuttle
plot_change_note: The dialogue shifts Red from covert evasion to direct negotiation and urgency, openly referencing override codes and a station-wide threat. The pilots' motivations focus more on risk avoidance and cooperation, less on immediate bounty capture. Axel is openly skeptical, challenging Red's manifest and acting as a supervisor, not just a covert ally. The alliance is now built more on necessity and crisis than deception and stealth. The plot has been updated to reflect these changes in character motivation, stance, and interaction.
